Name: Seventh Son
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. Carefully pour beer to FLOAT on top of drink.
Review: Cognac forms the base of this cocktail which resembles a luxurious glass of beer, and indeed beer tops the drink. Rich cherry and rose lightly sweeten.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Richard Grimsey at Encore Brasserie Londonderry, Ireland.
Nutrition: One serving of Seventh Son contains 194 calories
